title: Urban Agriculture and Traditional Ecological Knowledge

questions.question: What is the primary advantage of urban agriculture in terms of food security?
choices: Reducing dependence on distant food sources
Eliminating the need for rural agriculture
questions.answer: Reducing dependence on distant food sources

questions.question: Which of the following is a traditional Timorese agricultural practice?
What is the Timorese term for traditional shifting cultivation?
Which of the following is NOT a common challenge in implementing urban agriculture?
What is the term for the traditional Timorese practice of setting prohibitions on natural resource use?
Which of the following is a benefit of intercropping in urban agriculture?
What role do sacred groves play in traditional Timorese land management?
choices: Protected areas with cultural and ecological significance
questions.answer: Protected areas with cultural and ecological significance

questions.question: Which of the following is a common medicinal plant in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary goal of permaculture in urban agriculture?
choices: Maximizing crop yields through intensive farming
Mimicking natural ecosystems for sustainable food production
Promoting the use of synthetic fertilizers
questions.answer: Mimicking natural ecosystems for sustainable food production

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical benefit of urban agriculture in Timor-Leste?
What is a potential solution for addressing soil contamination in urban agriculture?
choices: Using raised beds or container gardening
Increasing the use of chemical fertilizers
questions.answer: Using raised beds or container gardening

choices: Increasing the urban heat island effect

questions.question: Which of the following is a challenge in adapting shifting cultivation to urban contexts?
What is a potential cultural benefit of urban agriculture in Timor-Leste?
choices: Strengthening community bonds through shared gardening practices
questions.answer: Strengthening community bonds through shared gardening practices

choices: Continuous cultivation with no fallow period

choices: Need for supportive urban planning policies
questions.answer: Need for supportive urban planning policies

choices: Developing community allotments and shared gardens

choices: Advocating for the abandonment of traditional practices

choices: Maximizing the use of synthetic inputs
